intro: Haworthia giftbergensis, commonly known as the Giftberg Haworthia, is a compact, rosette-forming succulent native to South Africa. It features dense, fleshy leaves that are typically blue-green in color with white or pale markings. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow or orange during the warmer months. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires minimal water, making it suitable for rock gardens or container cultivation. Due to its unique appearance and low maintenance, it is a popular choice among succulent enthusiasts.
